articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Asian markets plunge with Japan's Nikkei diving nearly 8% after big Wall St. meltdown - NPR
articles.description: Asian shares nosedived on Monday after the meltdown Friday on Wall Street over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff hikes and the backlash from Beijing.
articles.content:
BANGKOK Asian shares nosedived on Monday after the meltdown Friday on Wall Street over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff hikes and the resulting backlash from Beijing.
